item.title: Master Caution/Warning Systems – Master WARNING Lights (Pilot’s Glare Shield)

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided master warning aural system and all discrete warning lights are operative.

note.para: The Red Discrete Warning Lights that must be operative are located on the forward instrument panel:
The Red Discrete Warning Lights that must be operative are located on the forward instrument panel:

placard.para: Placard affected Master WARNING Light "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
